text: (anathayinge depalavalata bharakarayeku vasayen pat vu oba, ema anathayin) buddhiya adu aya vasayen sitiyahot jivanadhara vasayen allah æti karana oba veta æti (ovunge) vastun ovun veta bara nodenu. ehet ovunta (pramanavat) aharada, ovunta (avasya) ændum pælandumda eyin laba di, ovunta adaravanta vadan pavasa (hondadænuma laba demin) sitinu mænava
